document_data.name: Nulu
document_data.mainbody: '''Nulu''' was a [[shadovar]] warrior in [[Anauroch]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History:
In 1479 DR, Nulu was a veteran shadovar warrior who had served under captain [[Durbela]] many times.

She was chosen by her captain to be part of the mission to gain control of the [[Spiral Gate]], a crucial [[portal nexus]].
document_data.Personality: Nulu was vengeful, fearless, and sadistic. Only Durbela's words could control her.
